channel.title: Rdcomclient on Glen C. Falk
channel.description: Recent content in Rdcomclient on Glen C. Falk

item.title: Client Reporting Platform
item.description: Architected, deployed and maintained a sophisticated client reporting platform developed in R. Developed Tidyverse solutions to circumvent input validation issues. Built With R - R programming language. ReporteRs - R package. rJava - R package. License This website is licensed under the MIT License - see the LICENSE.md file for details. Acknowledgments Special Thanks to Joshua Ulrich for pointing out the significance of reprex to me.
